name: INFERNAL MERCHANT DEMO
description:
Created for my Final Major Project at College, the concept of the game is half roguelike dungeon crawler and half item shop simulator - this demo only includes 1 fixed floor of the 'roguelike' stuff. You play as a loot demon who does not attack, and her role is to run around collecting items and avoiding enemies whilst completing randomly generated missions per room. Fill your bag and step on the pentagram to win!

CONTROLS
ARROW KEYS FOR DIRECTIONS
E TO PICK UP ITEMS
CTRL TO SEE YOUR ITEMS
ENTER TO SPAWN (and to start the game, do not be deceived by the big 'play' box)

Also to escape the Knight you have to run back through rooms you've completed, get far enough away and he'll lose you!
